predicate.note: Frames file for 'sublet' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to rent property one holds by lease to another

example.name: all arguments
example.text: WPP , which [*T*-1] assumes financial control of its businesses in a hands-on way , instituted a new financial system and plans [*-2] to sublet some floors in Ogilvy 's new headquarters building to outsiders .
example.arg: [*-2] -> WPP , which [*T*-1] assumes financial control of its businesses in a hands-on way ,
some floors in Ogilvy 's new headquarters building
